com.datastax.driver.core

Class MaterializedViewMetadata

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.datastax.driver.core.AbstractTableMetadata
      • com.datastax.driver.core.MaterializedViewMetadata

  • public class MaterializedViewMetadata
extends AbstractTableMetadata
    An immutable representation of a materialized view. Materialized views are available starting from Cassandra 3.0.

    • Field Summary
